name: Claude Code Dev Container
postCreateCommand: ~/.local/bin/init-claude.sh && echo '=== Verifying Development Environment ===' && claude --version && echo 'Claude Code: ✓' && zsh --version && echo 'Zsh: ✓' && python --version && echo 'Python: ✓' && go version && echo 'Go: ✓' && ruby --version && echo 'Ruby: ✓' && node --version && echo 'Node.js: ✓' && npm --version && echo 'npm: ✓' && git --version && echo 'Git: ✓' && tig --version && echo 'Tig: ✓' && ssh -V && echo 'SSH: ✓' && echo '=== All tools installed successfully ==='
